mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_goods_goods_video (VIDEO_ID, VIDEO_URL, SOURCE_ID, SKIM_COUNT, SPOT_COUNT, FAV_COUNT, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER, ADD_USER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_NAME, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_DESC) values (#{videoId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{skimCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spotCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{favCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dcdg_goods_goods_video set VIDEO_URL = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, SKIM_COUNT = #{skimCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPOT_COUNT = #{spotCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FAV_COUNT = #{favCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADD_USER = #{addUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, ADD_USER_NAME = #{addUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_TITLE = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_DESC = #{videoDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=CHAR}
